title: Genetic clues to high rates of asthma in those of African ancestry

title_detail.value: Genetic clues to high rates of asthma in those of African ancestry

summary: In the largest study of its kind, researchers have found new clues into the parts of the human genome associated with the higher rates of asthma in those of African ancestry.

summary_detail.value: In the largest study of its kind, researchers have found new clues into the parts of the human genome associated with the higher rates of asthma in those of African ancestry.
